Name: Stela
Description: Tall stela with the top broken off. Part of the offering scene and of the inscription, consisting of 23 lines, is preserved. The entire surface is framed by a simple carved line. At the sides, the distance from this line to the edge of the stela is half that of the distance at the bottom. The figures are represented in extremely low relief, with hardly any details. The signs have been scratched in and the lines are separated by a carved line.
